short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate your GPA with grades from your ACOE marksheet!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension calculates your GPA for a specific semester by mapping subject codes to your curriculum. All students in UDs at Anna University can use this extension on their ACOE Attendance & Mark Sheet page. The departments are limited to CSE (R2015), IT, ECE, EEE, Mechanical, BME, and Civil.
